Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class CharacterTurnTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.CharacterTurnTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
FarmerTurnTest, InfluenceCharacterTurnTest, PostmanTurnTest
public abstract class CharacterTurnTest extends Object
Class CharacterTurnTest tests the method of the Turn class when expert mode is enabled

  • Method Details

    • initialization

      @BeforeEach public void initialization()

    • professorsInitialization

      protected void professorsInitialization()
      Sets the students of the players, and the initial professors of the players

    • updateProfessorsTest

      @Test public void updateProfessorsTest()
      Method tests if the turn.updateProfessors(Player[]) method works as expected. If the FARMER Character is activated then the player that has activated it is expected to take control of the professors even when the number of students is even. If the FARMER CharacterCard is not activated then normal rules apply.

    • getMaxStepsMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void getMaxStepsMotherNatureTest()
      Method tests if the turn.getMaxStepsMotherNature() method works as expected. If the POSTMAN Character is activated then two additional steps are allowed to the player that has activated the card. If the POSTMAN CharacterCard is not activated then normal rules apply.

    • updateInfluenceTest

      @Test public void updateInfluenceTest()
      Method tests if the turn.updateInfluence(IslandManager, Island, Player[]) works as expected. If one of the CharacterCard that modifies the influence is activated then the method needs to work accordingly. If those CharacterCards are not activated normal rules apply.

    • islandInitialization

      public void islandInitialization()
      Method sets the islands
